title: shrI rangarAjA
sahitya:
shrI rangarAjA shrI rangarAjA un sEvAnandamE paramAnandamE appA


anupallavi

  AraNap-poruLellAm aDangiya uruvamAi Ala vandAr kaNDa aravaNai shelvanE


caraNam 1    shakti varalakSmi ayya mArbilE tulanga jaganmAtA unnaDit-tAmaraiyil viLanga 
bhakti hrdayamAna pArkkaDal mIdilE parama kuNDali mElE turiyattuyil vaLarum
    caraNam 2    ulagait-turumbena unnaik-karumbenavE urugi urugi anbgu perugip-padamaDainda 
kulashEkharap-perumAn koNDa bhakti prasAdam koDuttenai rakSikkaP-piDittEn un ponnaDi
    caraNam 3    kAma japam ozhittun nAma japam aruLvAi kaLLa nIlan manattaik-koLLai koNDa vaLLalE 
Om namO nArAyaNA hari Om enrE Odum anbaruk-kanubhUti tarum arasE
